 the litle girl.

 Kumbana was heart- 
 
 broken. He cried and cried 
 
 because he was separated 
 
 from his daughter. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Time went on, and 
 
 Kumbana found a new 
 
 girlfriend to. They lived 
 
 together, but they did not

 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Now Kheri did not like her 
 
 new father at al. She was 
 
 very unhapy, and he used 
 
 to beat her. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 So when she was 12, her 
 
 mother decided to send her 
 
 back to live with her real 
 
 father. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1
